forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind with a few rumbles of thunder. Low 5C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind with a few rumbles of thunder. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds this evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers early...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 10C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 50F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 50F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 10C. E winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High around 50F. E winds shifting to N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
